text: Erin Brown Thomas is an American writer/director who creates tragicomedies. She graduated from Revere High School, and Malone University. Erin is the co- founder of Salute Your Shorts Film Festival. == Filmography == * [subtext] , 2023 * Chasers 2025 == References == Category:American filmmakers Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Erin Brown Thomas
